segments.text: What a strange little tableau this kitchen presents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside the window is so ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, everything seems poised for some kind of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is just relentless, a river on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman continues her dish drying, absolutely serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite frustrating to witness such obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is practically defying gravity on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so anxious to see it tilting like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wet floor adds another layer of peril to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect storm of domestic chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
